entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Snow inland. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries after midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Snow inland. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm inland. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
